name: A Very Pretty Pipe Dream or Memeify McCree or A Chill Hell
name_original: A Very Pretty Pipe Dream or Memeify McCree or A Chill Hell
description:
An interactive comic for the Idle Thumbs Wizard Jam 2016, Made in cwine, an interactive comic tool currently in development by jonkk

Click on the pink bits to progress!

If the view's not great, try the fullscreen button.
